import React from 'react'; import { categories } from './categorieslist'; import { topDeals } from './categorieslist'; import "./categories.css" export function Category() { return ( <>

Shop by Categories:

{categories.map((category) => (

{category.name}

{category.description}

{deal.product}

{deal.price}

{deal.totalAmount}

))}
